extends java.lang.Object

public void redoMove()
Re-plays a previously-undone move. Does nothing if the redo stack is empty.

serialize

public java.lang.String serialize()
Serialize the game to a string. Deserialize later with deserialize(). The string contains only URL-safe characters (A-Z, a-z, digits, periods, commas, and hyphens).

deserialize

public static Game deserialize(java.lang.String str)
Deserialize a game from the string created by serialize().
